lead_paragraph: The authorities declared a state of emergency amid a wave of demonstrations by people who say the government unlawfully seized their land.

headline.print_headline: Ethiopia Arrests 1,645 ‘Ringleaders and Bandits’ in Crackdown
headline.main: Ethiopia Arrests Hundreds of ‘Ringleaders and Bandits’ in Effort to Quell Protests

snippet: The authorities declared a state of emergency amid a wave of demonstrations by people who say the government unlawfully seized their land....
